result.eng: Some people never stop laughing at them.
result.ga: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.orig: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.html: Tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áiritheSome people never stop laughing at them.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad de ẛíor ina gceap magaiḋ ag daoine áiriṫeSome people never stop laughing at them.

result.eng: He makes a laughing stock out of Ireland.
result.html: Déanann sé ceap magaidh d'ÉirinnHe makes a laughing stock out of Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Déanann sé ceap magaiḋ d'ÉirinnHe makes a laughing stock out of Ireland.

result.eng: It was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ga: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.orig: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.html: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamhIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ponchtml: Ise a rinne ceap magaiḋ dínne agus dár gcreideaṁIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!

result.eng: He was his school friends' laughing stock.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláirí
result.orig: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláirí
result.html: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláiríHe was his school friends' laughing stock.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ina ċeap magaiḋ ag a ċoṁscoláiríHe was his school friends' laughing stock.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
